name: Mickey's Dangerous Chase
description: Big Bad Pete swiped Minnie's birthday present and spoiled Mickey's surprise. Mickey is out to get Minnie's present back and chases Pete through some dangerous places. In this awesome adventure, you play as Mickey Mouse. Enjoy the wonderful world of Disney as you follow Big Bad Pete through towns, woods, rooftops, mountains and factories. Help Mickey throw boxes at the bad guys while grabbing Stars and Prizes. Ride the speedboat, jalopy and a bouquet of balloons and get that present back! Better hurry!
